sponsor.partnerMessage: Since 1957, Underwoods has been committed to quality and value. Named "Coolest Store in America" by InStore Magazine, and winner of state, national, and international design awards, Underwoods' dedication to craftsmanship and design excellence creates timeless jewelry.

posts.title: BrickCity In Fayetteville Grand Opening Celebration This Weekend
posts.photoCredit: The Shops At Brick City Fayetteville
posts.content:
The Fayetteville BrickCity location is open, and there will be an official grand opening celebration this Saturday. 

  • Shop one, shop all: The new market called BrickCity in Fayetteville, located in Evelyn Hills Shopping Center at 1404 N. College Ave., is a growth opportunity for retail and features dozens of local, small businesses with individual booths inside. Like a flea market, almost.
  • Celebrate: The grand opening celebration will feature hundreds of dollars in gift certificate giveaways, basket drawings, and individual store giveaways. There will also be gourmet samples of treats throughout BrickCity 10-2p. 

Learn more HERE.

posts.title: A&P Commission To Kickstart Downtown Business Association In Fayetteville
posts.content:
For the first time in 13 years, Fayetteville could have an official business association that would advocate for the entire downtown area. 

  • A new role: The Advertising and Promotion Commission voted on Monday to allocate $100,000 to create a director of downtown initiatives position. The person who fills the position will start as an employee of the cityâ€™s tourism bureau, Experience Fayetteville, and will transition to reporting to its board of directors from an independent organization. 
  • A growing city: A previous downtown association called Fayetteville Downtown Partners dissolved in 2009. With the revitalization of Block Ave., the Mill District, the Square, and the upcoming Cultural Arts Corridor, a promotional group looks like a good idea for business owners in Fayetteville. 

Read the Fayetteville Flyer story HERE.

posts.title: Johnson Hosting Grand Opening For Johnson Square
posts.content:
Tis the season for summer series! In addition to starting a summer series tomorrow, Johnson is hosting its grand opening of Johnson Square.

  • The event: The Square is right next door to Hail Fellow Well Met at 5467 Hackett St., and live music by Nathan Perry and Smokey and the Mirror will start at 6p. The party will officially run until 8p, and there will be food and drinks too, so bring your friends!
  • The lineup: The summer series will continue on June 24 with a movie night, July 22 with Oh Jeremiah, August 26 with a movie night, and September 8 with The Riverside.

Learn more HERE.

posts.title: Arkansas Air and Military Museum Offering Free Admission Saturday
posts.content:
Do you know about the Arkansas Air and Military Museum in Fayetteville? 

  • Special event: The Arkansas Air and Military Museum is worth visiting any day of the year, but this weekend there will be a free museum day, 11-4p, for the entire family.
  • Climb aboard: See history come to life with a large display of classic aircraft and aviation memorabilia, and even climb aboard and explore historic aircraft for yourself! Fun fact, many of the historic aircraft on display can still take flight!

Learn more HERE.

posts.title: Walton Executive MBA Program Invites Professionals Into A Global Immersion Experience
posts.topic: Sponsored by the Walton MBA Program at the University of Arkansas
posts.content:
The Walton Executive MBA program offers a broad knowledge of how business fits together and is ready to transform your life and accelerate your career if you are. 

  • Critically acclaimed: The Wall Street Journal recently ranked the Walton MBA program #11 out of 600 programs for its return on investment, and U.S. News & World Reports ranked the program as the 36th best public MBA in the nation. 
  • Designed for you: The program is 2-years, primarily online, with one in-person Saturday each month designed to network with your cohort and faculty. You will have the opportunity to travel the world in a global immersion experience through the program, too. The program starts in the fall, and GMAT/GRE waivers are available now. 

Learn more and apply HERE before July 1.
